Sentencas: The cathode material (La(0.8)Sr(0.2)MnO(3)) in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) was plasma sprayed on mild steel in a reactive DC thermal plasma spray process.
Titulo: Direct production of porous cathode material (La1-xSrxMnO3) using a reactive DC thermal plasma spray system

Sentencas: This high-speed process of depositing thin films for the components of SOFCs was examined experimentally.
Titulo: Direct production of porous cathode material (La1-xSrxMnO3) using a reactive DC thermal plasma spray system

Sentencas: The results showed that a coating layer of La(0.8)Sr(0.2)MnO(3) with a particular porosity could be obtained directly using both prereacted La(0.8)Sr(0.2)MnO(3) and mixed raw materials (La(2)O(3), SrCO(3), and MnO or MnCO(3)) as feed materials with or without a pore former.
Titulo: Direct production of porous cathode material (La1-xSrxMnO3) using a reactive DC thermal plasma spray system

Sentencas: The heat treatment of the plasma coating material at 1073 K (800 degreesC) for 3 h significantly enhanced the desired crystallization of La(0.8)Sr(0.2)MnO(3) in the coated material.
Titulo: Direct production of porous cathode material (La1-xSrxMnO3) using a reactive DC thermal plasma spray system
